provenance.source_reference: Die modernste Karte der Antarktis - Prof. Dr. Manfred Buchroithner (Transcript)
provenance.notes: Mentioned in list of major world maps. Original held in Bibliothèque nationale de France.

commonly_stated_claims: Early detailed coastal depiction of parts of South America and Africa.
One of the earliest maps to show the newly discovered lands of the Americas.
known_limits: Not a full global accuracy claim; coastal detail varies by region.
Some regions show conjectural coastlines, particularly in the southern Atlantic.
